name: Chocolate Tasting Tour
description:
Ambrosia Tasting Tour is an introduction and experience of cultures through chocolate.  Learn the simple art of eating chocolate so you can experience it's fullness thorugh all senses.  
Also refine your palatte to taste the intricate flavour notes and layers each chocolate has - just like wines, scotches,  etc.  

In each box are 4 - 5 g single origin chocolates (20g) from Venezuela, Colombia, Ecuador, and Peru.  Included is one guide to help shape your experience including a flavour wheel and map.  PLUS one mystery chocolate.  Great fun for 2 to 4 people (or one chocolate lover) ;)

Available limited time only ;)

name: Ambrosia Beans - Gift Bag
description:
Nourishing and Irresistible!  These are 30g bags of exquisite roasted Colombian cacao nibs mixed with natural sweets.  Including:  Cacao nibs with Maple Flakes, Blueberries, & Chocolate Shavings.  The gift bag includes all 3 flavours PLUS one extra pouch of simply cacao nibs.

Perfect gift for hikers & skiers
Also great for adding to smoothies, granola etc.

name: Ambrosia Artisan Bar Collection
description:
Ambrosia has 6 different artisan chocolates - each chocolate experience comes in the form of a 30g hand wrapped bar.  All made in small batches. Certified organic ingrediens.  Fairly Traded cacao beans (committed to farmers certification)  Sweetened with a naturally grown cane sugar. 

Get all 6 in this collection!

Crystal Rose:  Inspired by the power of rose quartz: this bar encapsulates the unconditional love that this crystal embodies. A 61% dark chocolate infused with a pure therepeutic grade rose oil and Bolivian Rose salt , all coming together to unlock hidden yearnings.  

ColibriBerry:  a power blend of seeds and berries with a dark 70% Colombian chocolate-organic blueberries and acai berry blended with organic hemp hearts.  Colibri is the spanish word for hummingbird – the totem for ambrosia chocolates.

Ixcacao:  Pronounced (eesh-kakow) this is the name of the Mayan goddess of chocolate-known for abundance and fertility. The bar: pure, solid and dark (66% cacao mass) decorated with roasted cacao nibs (chocolate in its natural form).

the Mayan Tradition:  Allow yourself to experience the alchemy of ingredients which the Mayans traditionally used to drink cacao in ceremony. Fresh ground pepper corn, organic ground purple corn and organic cinnamon are the highlights in this dark Colombian bar of  chocolate.

Calliope: our smallest North American hummingbird – with greens, white and rufous coloring – this bar is in honor of the joy hummingbirds emanate with green cardamom & shredded coconut in a 61% dark chocolate.

Radiance:  the most recent addition to the artisan bar collection.  Inspired by the brilliant colors of cacao pods – mixing purples, greens, and reds – with red raspberries, exotic peppermint and earthy rooibos tea.

name: NECTAR Hot Chocolate
description:
This decandent blend of single origin Colombian chocolate with deep and rich cacao powder soothes the body, eases the mind and fulfills the soul.  It's just like being right at the source where cacao grows - deep in the jungles amongst the hummingbirds & toucans, grand trees & waterfalls and coco & mango trees.  

The Cacao beans used to produce this bag of Nectar originate in the Macuira Region of Colombia - the north caribean coast.  This is the home of the Kogi and other indigineous tribes.  Experience the feeling of this powerful place through a cup of Nectar.  

All the beans are fairly traded and organically grown.  This is a GMO free product, vegan friendly, and dairy & gluten free.  All handcrafted with love in the Kootenays ;)

name: Crystal Rose Artisan Chocolate
description:
§ Inspired by the essense of Rose quartz - unconditional love.  This is a 30 g bar of dark single origin Colombian chocolate infused with  pure organic rose oil and decorated with hand-harvested Bolivian pink salt.  

Rose calms & supports the heart, and restores a sense of well-being. Chocolate is also connected with invoking love and nourishing for our hearts.   Together they create a wonderful heart warming experience.

These chocolates are great for wedding favours or heart gifts to yourself or another. 

Please contact me if you have any questions!  Inquire about ordering different quantities.
